name: Ext_R5_ImagingStudy_se_laterality
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.ImagingStudy.series.laterality for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents ImagingStudy.series.laterality from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/ImagingStudy|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.definition: The laterality of the (possibly paired) anatomic structures examined. E.g., the left knee, both lungs, or unpaired abdomen. If present, shall be consistent with any laterality information indicated in ImagingStudy.series.bodySite.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.series.laterality` maps to R4 `ImagingStudy.series.laterality`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

element.definition: The laterality of the (possibly paired) anatomic structures examined. E.g., the left knee, both lungs, or unpaired abdomen. If present, shall be consistent with any laterality information indicated in ImagingStudy.series.bodySite.
element.comment: `ImagingStudy.series.laterality` maps to R4 `ImagingStudy.series.laterality`. So is mapped as Equivalent.

binding.description: Codes describing body site laterality (left, right, etc.).
